CustomField.description: If TRUE your price books is automatically adjusted with MSRP changes. EXAMPLE: If you had 20% off Red Wing and the MSRP increases; your 20% remains but it is off the new MSRP. Field Type: IA Integrated: Y
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If TRUE your price book is automatically adjusted with MSRP changes. EXAMPLE: If you had 20% off Red Wing and the MSRP increases; your 20% remains but it is off the new MSRP.
CustomField.label: Auto Update Price
